translations: v.征募；支持（enlist 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Enlisting help from others can make this easier.
sentences.translation: 得到别人的支持会使这变得容易些。

sentences.sentence: Additional expenses come when enlisting the help of porters and guides.
sentences.translation: 如果你雇佣搬运工和向导的话，还回增加额外的开支。

sentences.sentence: This they have done repeatedly, with the aim of deterring Catholics from enlisting.
sentences.translation: 他们屡次这样做，目的在于阻止天主教徒参军。
